name: Divyansh Gaur
bio: Divyansh drives the vision and mission of the team, ensuring that innovation and meaningful impact remain at the forefront of all initiatives.

name: Prerna Dadhich
bio: Prerna leads creative campaigns that enhance the team's visibility and connect their work with wider audiences in impactful ways.

name: Lakshya Rajvanshi
bio: Lakshya plays a key role in operational decision-making and long-term strategy, working closely with the founder to guide the team's direction.

bio: Aditya supports the team through meticulous planning and execution, ensuring that all aspects of a project are aligned and well-organized.

name: Anuj Modi
bio: Anuj contributes to the team's operational effectiveness by streamlining systems and ensuring smooth coordination behind the scenes.

bio: Bhavya specializes in crafting clean, user-friendly interfaces that elevate the visual appeal and usability of digital experiences.

name: Disha Kachwaha
bio: Disha ensures timely project delivery by managing workflows, keeping the team organized, and maintaining clear communication across tasks.

name: Kirti Shrimali
bio: Kirti creates intuitive, visually engaging user experiences that reflect a deep understanding of design and human-centered principles.

bio: Nidhi promotes wellness and balance within the team through her expertise in yoga and mindfulness practices.
